uk.cost: £41/month for Sky Sports, £25/month for BT Sport
uk.additionalInfo: Sky Sports and BT Sport share most live matches. Amazon shows select matches. BBC shows highlights on Match of the Day.

us.additionalInfo: NBC holds exclusive rights. Matches split between NBC, USA Network, and Peacock streaming.

canada.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Canada.

australia.additionalInfo: Optus Sport has exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Australia.

india.additionalInfo: Star Sports broadcasts select matches on TV. All matches available on Disney+ Hotstar.

france.additionalInfo: Canal+ and RMC Sport share broadcasting rights in France.

germany.additionalInfo: Sky Deutschland holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Germany.

spain.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to Premier League matches in Spain.

brazil.additionalInfo: ESPN Brasil broadcasts select matches on TV. All matches available on Star+ streaming.

mexico.additionalInfo: Sky Sports broadcasts select matches on TV. Paramount+ offers streaming of all matches.

china.additionalInfo: iQIYI Sports holds exclusive digital rights for Premier League in China.

japan.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all Premier League matches in Japan.
